body_html:
You could also try getting a binary for installation with pip (instructions on the main site.

If the problem is your connection, then building from source would probably help. There are plans for making a small CPU-only pytorch package (#4178) that could help with slow connections.
body_text:
You could also try getting a binary for installation with pip (instructions on the main site.
If the problem is your connection, then building from source would probably help. There are plans for making a small CPU-only pytorch package (#4178) that could help with slow connections.
body:
You could also try getting a binary for installation with pip (instructions on the [main site](http://pytorch.org/). 

If the problem is your connection, then building from source would probably help. There are plans for making a small CPU-only pytorch package (#4178) that could help with slow connections.
